resources.string: Note. /n Please input your correct email and true email; in order for as to send the rewards to your inbox. We will send the rewards to you within 24-72 hours.
This app & the services are not associated, affilliated, endorsed or sponsored by PlayStation
Exchange coins for PLAYSTATION Promo Codes

string-array.name: instruction
string-array.item: 3.Exchange earned coins for free coupons with generated code
4.We will send your coupon with promo code to your email address
5.Share received promo code to you friends to use it on PlayStation Network
6.They only need to charge their accounts to have fun together
